snippet: Attorney General Greg Abbott often speaks of the Mexican heritage of his wife, Cecilia Phalen Abbott, a onetime educator who would be the first Latina to be the first lady of Texas if he were elected.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Greg Abbott often speaks of the Mexican heritage of his wife, Cecilia Phalen Abbott, a onetime educator who would be the first Latina to be the first lady of Texas if he were elected.

headline.main: In Husband’s Campaign, a Chance to Make History
headline.print_headline: In Husband’s Campaign, a Chance to Make History
